hartvigsen_2022: Log in to huggingface and request access via form provided here: https://huggingface.co/datasets/toxigen/toxigen-data. Provide huggingface-token in function call.
jigsaw_2019: Log in to kaggle and register for competition via button here: https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/jigsaw-unintended-bias-in-toxicity-classification/data. Download all_data.csv from same site and manually upload the zip to a folder named 'input_folder' in the current working directory.
